full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Standing Offer for Bolts

##### Solicitation Number
WS3901371503

##### Publication Date
August 23, 2023

##### Closing Date
October 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the acquisition of bolts, including delivery in Montreal. The Standing Offer will be valid for a period of two years with the option to extend for an additional year.

#### Requirements

The contract is for the purchase of bolts, and the solicitation includes all relevant details regarding specifications, delivery requirements, and any other necessary information.

#### Tender Specifications
- The solicitation is open to all qualified contractors.
- The Government will award the Standing Offer to the bidder offering the lowest price.
- Bids must be submitted electronically via the Ariba Platform.

#### Relevant Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Entities
- Department of National Defence (DND)
- 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contact Information
Corine Lavoie (she/her) can be contacted at corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Additional Information
All relevant documentation and details regarding this solicitation can be found on the Ariba Platform.

This rewritten text has been formatted in markdown and includes all the relevant information contained in the original document. It is concise and easy to read, making it more accessible to a wider audience. The
